title: Cardiovascular problems for two types of Diabetes medicines
description:
Description
A comparison of cardiovascular problems for Rosiglitazone and Pioglitazone.
reference:
D.J. Graham et al. Risk of acute myocardial infarction, stroke,
heart failure, and death in elderly Medicare patients treated with
rosiglitazone or pioglitazone. In: JAMA 304.4 (2010), p. 411. issn:
0098-7484.

parameters.treatment:
a factor with levels Pioglitazone and
Rosiglitazone
parameters.cardiovascular_problems:
a factor with levels no and
yes

format: A data frame with 227571 observations on the following 2 variables.
